answers.author: Leslie Beauregard
answers.text:
The City of Charlottesville pays our local Chamber of Commerce $1,260 year to pretty much be listed as a member with a few member benefits.  But, no obligations on our part.

answers.author: Christopher Anderson
answers.text:
Central City, Nebraska pays $10,000 annually for a top-tier membership. No obligations in either direction.


Central City, Nebraska pays $10,000 annually for a top-tier membership. No obligations in either direction.


Save Changes
Cancel

answers.author: Samantha Abell
answers.text:
The City of Gautier, Mississippi pays $11,000 for a membership and place on the executive board of directors. The chamber organizes a ribbon cutting and media event for new businesses that open in the city, with no cost to the business.

author: Pamela Muse
text:
Manhattan Beach, CA is interested in learning what cities are doing re: funding your Chamber of Commerce? What’s the scope of the city’s responsible as to funding? Contractual obligations? Sources of revenue, etc
Whatever information you can provide is appreciated!
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: City Funding Chamber of Commerce
